t: Proverbs 7
My*pn son, obey my words, and*ln treasure my commands.
Keep*ln my commands and live, and*ln guard my instructions as*ln you would the pupil of your eye.
Tie*ln them to your fingers; write*ln them on the tablet of your heart.
Say*ln to wisdom, “You are my sister,” and*ln call understanding your relative.
She*ln will keep you from a forbidden woman, a*ln wayward woman with her flattering talk.
A Story of Seduction
At*pn the window of my house I*ln looked through my lattice.
I*ln saw among the inexperienced, I*ln noticed among the youths, a*ln young man lacking sense.
Crossing*ln the street near her corner, he*ln strolled down the road to her house
at*ln twilight, in the evening, in*ln the dark of the night.
A*ln woman came to meet him dressed*ln like a prostitute, having*ln a hidden agenda.
She*ln is loud and defiant; her*ln feet do not stay at home.
Now*ln in the street, now in the squares, she*ln lurks at every corner.
She*ln grabs him and kisses him; she*ln brazenly says to him,
“I’ve*ln made fellowship offerings; today*ln I’ve fulfilled my vows.
So*ln I came out to meet you, to*ln search for you, and I’ve found you.
I’ve*ln spread coverings on my bed— richly*ln colored linen from Egypt.
I’ve*ln perfumed my bed with*ln myrrh, aloes, and cinnamon.
Come,*ln let’s drink deeply of lovemaking until morning. Let’s*ln feast on each other’s love!
My*ln husband isn’t home; he*ln went on a long journey.
He*ln took a bag of silver with him and*ln will come home at the time of the full moon.”
She*ln seduces him with her persistent pleading; she*ln lures with her flattering talk.
He*ln follows her impulsively like*ln an ox going to the slaughter, like*ln a deer bounding toward a trap
until*ln an arrow pierces its liver, like*ln a bird darting into a snare— he*ln doesn’t know it will cost him his life.
Now,*pn sons, listen to me, and*ln pay attention to the words from my mouth.
Don’t*ln let your heart turn aside to her ways; don’t*ln stray onto her paths.
For*ln she has brought many down to death; her*ln victims are countless.
Her*ln house is the road to Sheol, descending*ln to the chambers of death.
